name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Salvatore VENEZIA

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
Justice SAYLOR did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Salvatore VENEZIA.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justice SAYLOR did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Michael D. Marino, Dist. Atty., Patricia E. Coonahan, Asst. Dist. Atty., Mary MacNeil Killinger, Executive Asst. Dist. Atty., Bruce L. Castor, Jr., 1st Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Salvatore VENEZIA.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Feb. 2, 1999.
Decided Feb. 24, 1999.
Michael D. Marino, Dist. Atty., Patricia E. Coonahan, Asst. Dist. Atty., Mary MacNeil Killinger, Executive Asst. Dist. Atty., Bruce L. Castor, Jr., 1st Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellant.
Victor M. Snyder, for appellee.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
